summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6078 for the improvement of 19th Avenue Southwest from Austin Street to West Holden Street; and certain other streets and avenues; by grading and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 83547, and levying and assessing amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
